seniority_level.evidence: Title mentions 'Data Engineer' without seniority qualifiers, and minimum of 3 years of experience is specified, which aligns with mid-level roles in the IC hierarchy.

job_family.evidence: Title is 'Data Engineer-Business Intelligence' and responsibilities focus on reporting, visualization, and BI tools like Cognos.

sub_specialty.evidence: Core focus on ETL/Data Integration tools (IBM InfoSphere DataStage, Azure Data Factory, Informatica PowerCenter) and BI DW projects, with no emphasis on streaming or real-time.

leadership_expectation.evidence: Role emphasizes individual tasks such as developing reports, troubleshooting, and debugging, with no mention of leadership or mentoring responsibilities.

primary_cloud.evidence: Multiple cloud platforms (AWS, Google, Azure) are mentioned as preferred experience, but no single cloud is emphasized as primary.

secondary_clouds.evidence: AWS, Azure, and Google Cloud are listed as nice-to-have or preferred skills, indicating exposure to multiple clouds.

processing_paradigm.evidence: Focus on ETL/Data Integration tools and BI DW projects suggests batch processing, with no explicit mention of streaming or real-time paradigms.

orchestrator_category.evidence: No orchestrator tools like Airflow, Luigi, or cloud-native orchestrators are explicitly mentioned.

storage_layer.evidence: BI DW projects and reporting/visualization focus suggest a data warehouse storage layer, though no specific technologies are mentioned.

remote_restriction.evidence: Location is specified as Pune, but no remote work model or restrictions are discussed.

timezone_focus.evidence: No timezone requirements or team distribution details are provided.

relocation_required.evidence: Location is specified as Pune, but no mention of relocation packages or requirements is made, suggesting the candidate must already be based there.

h1b_friendly.evidence: No visa sponsorship is mentioned in the job posting or Pass 1 extraction.

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: No explicit mention of OPT/CPT or student visa support, and the role requires full-time education, which may not align with student visa statuses.

citizenship_required.evidence: No discussion of citizenship or work authorization requirements beyond education.

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Employment type is stated as full-time, but no contract type (W2, C2C, 1099) is specified.

benefits_level.evidence: No benefits are listed in the Pass 1 extraction results.

growth_path_clarity.evidence: Mentions 'continuous improvement' and 'growth opportunities' but lacks specific career tracks or promotion ladders.

mentorship_signals.evidence: Role involves developing and maintaining relationships with business and technical members of the team, which may include learning from senior team members.

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No explicit mention of promotion or advancement paths in the job posting.

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No discussion of internal mobility or role changes in the job posting.

career_tracks_available.evidence: No explicit or implied career tracks (IC, management, specialist, architect) are mentioned.

requirement_strictness.evidence: Job posting specifies strict education requirements (full-time MCA/M. Tech/B. Tech/B.E) and a minimum of 3 years of experience with specific hard skills like Cognos Developer & Admin.

scope_definition.evidence: Job description focuses on a single role with well-defined responsibilities in BI DW projects and reporting/visualization using Cognos.

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: Requirements align reasonably with a mid-level role (3 years of experience, specific BI tools).
